subject: Lotteries
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers did not need time after the draft lottery to decide whom to take with the No. 1 pick. They settled on Blake Griffin long ago. “I’d say we made the decision June 2008,” the assistant general manager Neil Olshey said. The Clippers won the first pick in the June 25 draft Tuesday when they won the lottery, moving up from the third-best chance. On Wednesday, the Clippers placed photographs of Griffin on their Web site to advertise ticket sales for next season.
